scripts.dev:server: cd service/dist/server && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--enable-source-maps concurrently -n tsc-service,nm-service --kill-others "tsc --build ../../tsconfig.json -w" "nodemon --delay 2 app.js"
scripts.dev:agent: cd service/dist/agent && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--inspect --enable-source-maps" concurrently -n tsc-agent,nm-agent --kill-others "tsc --build ../../tsconfig.json -w" "nodemon --delay 2 app.js"
